title: Unboxing The Sony A7R II
description: In this video I'll be unboxing the Sony A7R II for Awesome Stuff Week on YouTube. More info below.  It's Awesome Stuff Week: Gift Grab!  A holiday extravaganza that brings together your favorite YouTubers for a sneak peak at the best holiday gifts -- from tech toys to kitchen toys to...actual toys.  YouTube doesn't care if you've been naughty or nice -- you still deserve a shot at the greatest gifts this holiday season; you can find them here:    *The ad unit mentioned in the video currently only works in desktop
